00139             function                validate_parameters( $Parameters , $Conditions )
00140             {
00141                   try
00142                   {
00143                         foreach( $Parameters as $key1 => $p )
00144                         {
00145                               $p = explode( '=' , $p );
00146                               foreach( $Conditions as $key2 => $rev )
00147                               {
00148                                     if( $key2 == $p[ 0 ] )
00149                                     {
00150                                           $Matches = array();
00151                                           $Result = preg_match( $rev , $p[ 1 ] , $Matches );
00152                                           if( count( $Matches ) == 0 )
00153                                           {
00154                                                 return( false );
00155                                           }
00156                                     }
00157                               }
00158                         }
00159                         
00160                         return( true );
00161                   }
00162                   catch( Exception $e )
00163                   {
00164                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00165                   }
00166             }

00194             function                parse_parameters( $Parameters , $Conditions )
00195             {
00196                   try
00197                   {
00198                         $Parameters = explode( ';' , $Parameters );
00199                         
00200                         if( $this->validate_parameters( $Parameters , $Conditions ) )
00201                         {
00202                               $this->RawMacroParameters = $Parameters;
00203                               return( true );
00204                         }
00205                         
00206                         return( false );
00207                   }
00208                   catch( Exception $e )
00209                   {
00210                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00211                   }
00212             }

00248             function                other_macro_was_found( $TmpStartPos , $TmpEndPos , $Counter , $ParserCursor )
00249             {
00250                   try
00251                   {
00252                         if( $TmpStartPos !== false && $TmpEndPos !== false )
00253                         {
00254                               if( $TmpStartPos < $TmpEndPos )
00255                               {
00256                                     $ParserCursor = $TmpEndPos;
00257                               }
00258                               if( $TmpEndPos < $TmpStartPos )
00259                               {
00260                                     $Counter--;
00261                                     if( $Counter )$Counter++;
00262                                     $ParserCursor = $TmpStartPos;
00263                               }
00264                         }
00265                         
00266                         return( array( $Counter , $ParserCursor ) );
00267                   }
00268                   catch( Exception $e )
00269                   {
00270                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00271                   }
00272             }

00308             function                process_extra_cases( $TmpStartPos , $TmpEndPos , $Counter , $ParserCursor )
00309             {
00310                   try
00311                   {
00312                         if( $TmpStartPos !== false && $TmpEndPos === false )
00313                         {
00314                               $Counter++;
00315                               $ParserCursor = $TmpStartPos;
00316                         }
00317                         
00318                         if( $TmpStartPos === false && $TmpEndPos !== false )
00319                         {
00320                               $Counter--;
00321                               $ParserCursor = $TmpEndPos;
00322                         }
00323                         
00324                         if( $TmpStartPos === false && $TmpEndPos === false )
00325                         {
00326                               throw( new Exception( "Closing { was not found" ) );
00327                         }
00328                         
00329                         return( array( $Counter , $ParserCursor ) );
00330                   }
00331                   catch( Exception $e )
00332                   {
00333                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00334                   }
00335             }

00367             function                find_parameters_end( $StringData , $MacroName , $ParserCursor )
00368             {
00369                   try
00370                   {
00371                         $Counter = 1;
00372                         
00373                         do
00374                         {
00375                               $TmpStartPos = strpos( $StringData , '{' , $ParserCursor + 1 );
00376                               $TmpEndPos = strpos( $StringData , '}' , $ParserCursor + 1 );
00377                               
00378                               list( $Counter , $ParserCursor ) = $this->other_macro_was_found( 
00379                                     $TmpStartPos , $TmpEndPos , $Counter , $ParserCursor 
00380                               );
00381                               
00382                               list( $Counter , $ParserCursor ) = $this->process_extra_cases( 
00383                                     $TmpStartPos , $TmpEndPos , $Counter , $ParserCursor 
00384                               );
00385                         }
00386                         while( $TmpStartPos && $Counter != 0 );
00387 
00388                         return( $Counter == 0 ? $TmpEndPos : false );
00389                   }
00390                   catch( Exception $e )
00391                   {
00392                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00393                   }
00394             }

00430             function                parse_macro( $StringData , $MacroName , $Conditions , $StartPos )
00431             {
00432                   try
00433                   {
00434                         $EndPos = $this->find_parameters_end( $StringData , $MacroName , $StartPos );
00435                         
00436                         if( $EndPos !== false )
00437                         {
00438                               /* extracting parameters */
00439                               $Parameters = substr( $StringData , $StartPos , $EndPos - $StartPos );
00440                               
00441                               return( $this->parse_parameters( $Parameters , $Conditions ) );
00442                         }
00443                         
00444                         return( false );
00445                   }
00446                   catch( Exception $e )
00447                   {
00448                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00449                   }
00450             }

00482             function                find_next_macro( $StringData , $MacroName , $Conditions )
00483             {
00484                   try
00485                   {
00486                         $this->RawMacroParameters = array();
00487                         $this->MacroParameters = false;
00488                         $StartPos = -1;
00489                         
00490                         $MacroStart = '{'.$MacroName.':';
00491                         $MacroLength = strlen( $MacroStart );
00492                         
00493                         for( ; ( $StartPos = strpos( $StringData , $MacroStart , $StartPos + 1 ) ) !== false ; )
00494                         {
00495                               $StartPos += $MacroLength;
00496                               
00497                               $Result = $this->parse_macro( $StringData , $MacroName , $Conditions , $StartPos );
00498 
00499                               if( $Result )
00500                               {
00501                                     $this->StartPosition = $StartPos - $MacroLength;
00502                                     return( true );
00503                               }
00504                         }
00505                         
00506                         return( false );
00507                   }
00508                   catch( Exception $e )
00509                   {
00510                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00511                   }
00512             }

00532             function                get_macro_parameters()
00533             {
00534                   try
00535                   {
00536                         if( $this->MacroParameters === false )
00537                         {
00538                               $this->MacroParameters = get_package_object( 'settings::settings' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00539                               $this->MacroParameters->load_settings( $this->RawMacroParameters );
00540                         }
00541                         
00542                         return( $this->MacroParameters );
00543                   }
00544                   catch( Exception $e )
00545                   {
00546                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00547                   }
00548             }

00576             function                get_positions( $StringData , $MacroName )
00577             {
00578                   try
00579                   {
00580                         $Positions = array();
00581                               
00582                         $StartPos = $this->StartPosition;
00583                         $EndPos = -1;
00584                         
00585                         for( ; $StartPos = strpos( $StringData , '{'.$MacroName.':' , $StartPos + 1 ) ; )
00586                         {
00587                               $Positions [ $StartPos ] = 's';
00588                         }
00589                         
00590                         for( ; $EndPos = strpos( $StringData , '{~'.$MacroName.'}' , $EndPos + 1 ) ; )
00591                         {
00592                               $Positions [ $EndPos ] = 'e';
00593                         }
00594                         
00595                         ksort( $Positions );
00596                         
00597                         return( $Positions );
00598                   }
00599                   catch( Exception $e )
00600                   {
00601                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00602                   }
00603             }
00604             
00643             function                process_position( $Value , $Key , $StartPos , $EndPos , $c )
00644             {
00645                   try
00646                   {
00647                         if( $StartPos === false && $Value === 's' )
00648                         {
00649                               $c++;
00650                               $StartPos = $Key;
00651                         }
00652                         elseif( $EndPos === false && $Value === 'e' && $c === 1 )
00653                         {
00654                               $EndPos = $Key;
00655                         }
00656                         elseif( $Value === 's' )
00657                         {
00658                               $c++;
00659                         }
00660                         elseif( $Value === 'e' )
00661                         {
00662                               $c--;
00663                         }
00664                         
00665                         return( array( $StartPos , $EndPos , $c ) );
00666                   }
00667                   catch( Exception $e )
00668                   {
00669                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00670                   }
00671             }
00672             
00695             function                get_macro_end_position( $StringData , $MacroName )
00696             {
00697                   try
00698                   {
00699                         $Positions = $this->get_positions( $StringData , $MacroName );
00700                         $StartPos = $this->StartPosition;
00701                         $EndPos = false;
00702                         $c = 1;
00703                         
00704                         foreach( $Positions as $Key => $Value )
00705                         {
00706                               if( $Value == 'e' && $Key > $this->StartPosition )
00707                               {
00708                                     list( $StartPos , $EndPos , $c ) = $this->process_position( 
00709                                           $Value , $Key , $StartPos , $EndPos , $c 
00710                                     );
00711                               }
00712                         }
00713                         
00714                         if( $EndPos === false )
00715                         {
00716                               throw_exception( 'Block end was not found' );
00717                         }
00718                         
00719                         $this->EndPosition = $EndPos;
00720                   }
00721                   catch( Exception $e )
00722                   {
00723                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00724                   }
00725             }

00753             function                hide_macro( $StringData , $MacroName )
00754             {
00755                   try
00756                   {
00757                         $this->get_macro_end_position( $StringData , $MacroName );
00758                         
00759                         $StringData = substr_replace( $StringData , 
00760                               '' , 
00761                               $this->StartPosition , 
00762                               $this->EndPosition - $this->StartPosition + strlen( '{~'.$MacroName.'}' ) 
00763                         );
00764                         
00765                         return( $StringData );
00766                   }
00767                   catch( Exception $e )
00768                   {
00769                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00770                   }
00771             }
00772             
00799             function                show_macro( $StringData , $MacroName )
00800             {
00801                   try
00802                   {
00803                         $this->get_macro_end_position( $StringData , $MacroName );
00804                         
00805                         $this->RawMacroParameters = implode( ';' , $this->RawMacroParameters );
00806                         $MacroLength = strlen( '{'."$MacroName:$this->RawMacroParameters}" );
00807 
00808                         $MacroData = substr( 
00809                               $StringData , 
00810                               $this->StartPosition + $MacroLength , 
00811                               $this->EndPosition - $this->StartPosition - $MacroLength
00812                         );
00813 
00814                         $StringData = substr_replace( $StringData , 
00815                               $MacroData , 
00816                               $this->StartPosition , 
00817                               $this->EndPosition - $this->StartPosition + strlen( '{~'.$MacroName.'}' ) 
00818                         );
00819                         
00820                         return( $StringData );
00821                   }
00822                   catch( Exception $e )
00823                   {
00824                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00825                   }
00826             }
00827             
00858             function                process_macro( $Mode , $StringData , $MacroName )
00859             {
00860                   try
00861                   {
00862                         if( $Mode == 'show' )
00863                         {
00864                               return( $this->show_macro( $StringData , $MacroName ) );
00865                         }
00866                         elseif( $Mode == 'hide' )
00867                         {
00868                               return( $this->hide_macro( $StringData , $MacroName ) );
00869                         }
00870                         else
00871                         {
00872                               throw( new Exception( "Macro processing mode '$Mode' is not defined" ) );
00873                         }
00874                         
00875                         return( $StringData );
00876                   }
00877                   catch( Exception $e )
00878                   {
00879                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00880                   }
00881             }
